events.title: 2025 MAASTRICHT CONCERT: ANDRE RIEU: WALTZ THE NIGHT AWAY
events.description: Join us for a spectacular concert featuring the renowned violinist Andre Rieu, as he performs timeless waltzes and classical favorites. Tickets: $25, Running time: 3hrs

events.title: 2025 – 2026 MET OPERA SEASON
time: El Último Sueño de Frida y Diego (May 30, 2026)
events.description: The Met’s award-winning series of live movie theater transmissions returns in October with an extraordinary lineup, including exciting company premieres, new productions, and classic repertory favorites.
